channel.title: CVE Feed for Preview E-Mails for WooCommerce -- Preview E-Mails for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Preview E-Mails for WooCommerce -- Preview E-Mails for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-42363|2024-09-17T03:48:20.001Z -- preview%20e-mails%20for%20woocommerce -- preview%20e-mails%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Preview E-Mails for WooCommerce WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the search_order parameter found in the ~/views/form.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.6.8.
